summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 4, 2020, regarding a request for assistance from Squad C-20 for the Maxwell investigation. The request seeks two volunteer agents to show digital evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

events.title: Scheduled Evidence Review at MDC
events.description: Planned for two FBI agents to show digital evidence from the Maxwell investigation to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

keyFacts: Squad C-20 of the FBI was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell as of November 2020.
The investigation involved digital evidence that required presentation to the defendant and her legal team.
The FBI was coordinating volunteers for a specific evidence review session scheduled for November 6, 2020, at the MDC.
